report.title: Report for triggers against NNSS alert species
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings for all species in the survey.
report.query: SELECT co.sample_id, co.survey_title, co.taxon, co.date_start, co.public_entered_sref, co.location_name, o.comment, co.website_id FROM cache_occurrences co JOIN occurrences o ON o.id = co.id WHERE co.website_id = 3 AND o.created_on > '#date#' AND co.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') AND co.zero_abundance = FALSE AND co.taxa_taxon_list_id IN (70,68,67,71,69,72,73,74,75,76,77,14,78,79,80,81,82) #order_by#
